name: Flick Tennis
description:
Now play Flick Tennis in multiplayer mode with players around the world, search for Flick Tennis Online (free) at the Appstore.

Flick Tennis is the Winner of People's Choice Award at the 8th International Mobile Gaming Awards (IMGA), Barcelona.

With millions of players worldwide, Flick Tennis is a critically acclaimed #1 tennis game on mobile with super intuitive controls & console-quality graphics. It's the only tennis game that provides you the entire depth of a game of tennis just like in real-life tennis - its unlike anything you seen or played before!

Flick Tennis Reviews
"I'm loving it" - Touch Arcade
"Best tennis game that I've ever played on any mobile platform" - MobileTechReviews
"I promise you’ve never seen anything like it.. one of the most unique, charming and frankly bonkers tennis games" - TouchGen
"It is the first tennis game that makes me feel like I am playing a real game of tennis. Seriously, it is just brilliant…" - Lost in Mobile

REDEFINING TENNIS
Redefining the intensity, passion, speed and fun of the game of tennis.

ULTIMATE REALISM
Breathtaking 3D graphics, hyper-realistic physics and real-life animations takes the game to a whole new level.

CONTROLS
Intuitive swipe controls for ground-stokes, lob, slice, drop etc. & strategic controls to move your player -Makes gameplay simple yet incredibly deep!
